welcome_message_body: "Welcome to West Carson, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, historic landmarks, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport is a modern and efficient facility, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Long Beach Municipal Airport is a smaller terminal primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: The largest terminal at LAX, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Serving Southwest Airlines and other domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serving international and domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serving domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Serving domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serving domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: Serving domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Serving domestic flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Serving domestic flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Limited free WiFi access is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whiteman Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Whiteman Airport serves as a secondary hub for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Monica Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Santa Monica Airport caters to private and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Ynez Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Santa Ynez Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at John Wayne Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at John Wayne Airport, primarily serving regional and commuter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No password is required.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for commercial flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
